document.full_text: the brain infection risk from biogen idec's multiple sclerosis drug tysabri appears highest during the third year of treatment, u.s. health officials said in an updated warning released on friday.
document.title: fda details timeframe of ms drug tysabri's risks
lines_and_colors: the brain infection risk from biogen idec's multiple sclerosis drug tysabri appears highest during the third year of treatment, u.s. health officials said in an updated warning released on friday.
